author: Gabby Orr
title: Trump’s religious backers line up to smack China over coronavirus
description: Evangelical leaders have long wanted Trump to press China hard on Christian persecution inside the country. Now, their focus is on its handling of a deadly virus.
content: The push for retaliatory measures by some of Trumps leading Christian supporters underscores the dicey position in which he finds himself as the 2020 election closes in: forced to determine whether a laundry list of accomplishments, such as an intact trade de… [+3082 chars]
